Sentencas: The symmetry of the room-temperature (RT) structure of title compounds La2-xSrxCoTiO6-delta changes with x, from P2(1)/n (0 <= x <= 0.2) to Pnma (0.3 <= x <= 0.5) and to R (3) over barc (0.6 <= x <= 1).
Titulo: Effect of Internal Pressure and Temperature on Phase Transitions in Perovskite Oxides: The Case of the Solid Oxide Fuel Cell Cathode Materials of the La2-xSrxCoTiO6 Series

Sentencas: For x = 1 the three pseudocubic cell parameters become very close suggesting a transition to a cubic structure for higher Sr contents.
Titulo: Effect of Internal Pressure and Temperature on Phase Transitions in Perovskite Oxides: The Case of the Solid Oxide Fuel Cell Cathode Materials of the La2-xSrxCoTiO6 Series

Titulo: Effect of Internal Pressure and Temperature on Phase Transitions in Perovskite Oxides: The Case of the Solid Oxide Fuel Cell Cathode Materials of the La2-xSrxCoTiO6 Series

Sentencas: The analysis of the evolution of the perovskite tolerance factor, t-factor, with both Sr content and temperature indicates that temperature has a limited ability to release structural stress and thus to enable transitions to more symmetric phases.
